mapper.update: UPDATE order_shop SET sku_status = #{skuStatus},update_time = #{updateTime} WHERE order_id = #{orderId} AND username = #{username} AND sku_id = #{skuId}
UPDATE order_shop SET sku_status = 1,update_time = #{updateTime} WHERE order_id = #{orderId} AND username = #{username} AND sku_status = 0
mapper.select: SELECT a.phone username,a.belong_station_no belongStationNo,a.sku_id skuId,a.`name` skuName, a.price skuPrice,b.sku_count skuCount,b.order_id orderId FROM product a JOIN product_order_jd b ON b.sku_id = a.sku_id AND b.order_id = #{orderId} JOIN order_jd c ON c.order_id = b.order_id AND c.produce_station_no = a.belong_station_no
